name: 張秉宸
objective:
本課程著重於隨機流量網路 (stochastic flow network) 的可靠度評估、分析和決策。在整個課程中，我們將介紹與隨機流量網路相關的數值分析方法、模擬技術和最佳化問題。此外，我們將在隨機流量網路模型的框架內深入探討最快路徑、多商品、路由政策和負載管理問題等主題。學生將有機會將這些方法和模型應用到實際系統中，包括電腦網路、電信、城市交通系統、電力傳輸網路和製造系統。
This course emphasizes the reliability evaluation, analysis, and decision-making aspects of stochastic flow networks. Throughout the course, we will introduce analytical methodologies, simulation techniques, and optimization problems related to stochastic flow networks. Furthermore, we will delve into topics like quickest path, multi-commodity, routing policies, and load management issues within the framework of stochastic flow network models. Students will have the opportunity to apply these methodologies and models to practical systems, including computer networks, telecommunications, urban traffic systems, power transmission networks, and manufacturing systems.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: The basic concept of network reliability
Week 3: MP-based reliability evaluation
Week 4: MC-based reliability evaluation
Week 5: QP-based reliability evaluation
Weeks 6-7: Simulation in network reliability
Weeks 8-9: Paper presentation for relevant works
Week 10: Maintainable network – Estimate and exact solutions
Weeks 11-13: Manufacturing network
Week 14: Stochastic project network
Week 15: Optimization issues in network reliability
Weeks 16-18: Final presentation
scorePolicy:
Class Participation 30%
Paper Presentation 30%
Final Presentation 40%
